1102634679574835200.text:
We need to get out of the comfort zone of rectangular glass. 

For this shift, world needs a visceral sensory response to something original.

I am confident that new versions of our current phones will not be the next form factor.

https://om.co/2019/03/03/what-folding-phones-say-about-state-of-smartphones/ …pic.twitter.com/nVUtKV9v5s

1102634675065905152.text:
The next form factor will be multi-modal and very visual.

The next form factor will be something that elicits the same emotional reaction that the iPhone’s rectangular screen and touch interface did when it debuted.

As soon as we saw it, we all wanted it.

1102634674491285504.text:
My guess — which you may take with a pinch of salt, as it is a big one — is that we should expect the next form factor to redefine our expectations of what a communications device is supposed to be.

We have recently gone from voice to app-centric form factors.

1102634671836291072.text:
At the end of the day, however, these foldable phones are still variants of the rectangular glass that was introduced over a decade ago.

Once 5G networks have to become a reality, we should expect the form factors to be redefined away from the glass rectangle.pic.twitter.com/pOAyDpGjyy

1102634668707405824.text:
We now stand at the cusp of the next generational shift in network capabilities. 

There is need to push 5G. The carriers are selling 5G hard (with lies.)

Handset makers will market foldable phones as a panacea. 

Huawei+ Samsung will probably make a lot of progress.

1102634668082454528.text:
Experimentation in handset designs that occurred around the time of 3G networks was a preamble to a shift in the form factor of our phones. 

With 4G/LTE, the form factor changed & we got the app boom. Smartphone screens & touch made it all too easy to go app-crazy.

1102634666253664257.text:
Today’s slowing sales for Apple, Samsung, and other smartphone makers remind me of a previous era. 

Today, we have seen the introduction of luxury high-end phones at exorbitant prices amid declining margins due to brutal price competition before.pic.twitter.com/hyBboi1Q8i

1102634661778341893.text:
